评论详情: Great fit and true to size.

评论概述: Stylish and nice fit, but the material does not breath
评论详情: The fit and cut is very flattering.  I paired it with a pair of hiking pants for an outdoor adventure and the look was perfect.  However, I was very disappointed by its lack of breathability.  Fortunately I had another tank along, as within minutes of getting active and starting to sweat, I had to shuck this shirt.  It made me feel terribly sticky and hot.

I typically wear a 2-3× in shirts. I don't like when material is the stretchy stuff that clings to my belly. This tank top is perfect. No clinging.  True to size. The thick band at the bottom hides my belly well.  I got the teal green color. It's super soft too!  I will buy it over and over in more colors. For reference I'm 5'5 234 lbs and carry my weight in my stomach
It is super light material but runs big I wear a large most of the time but it was too big si order a size down

This turned out to be a nice workout top. I’m 5’6” and around 165 lb, and XL fits me great. I also like that it’s long enough to hide my belly.

评论详情: This is a super soft very comfortable and flattering tank top.  It has nice band on the bottom that hugs your hips but is not tight at all.  It actually runs just a little big so if you are in between sizes I would size down.  Overall a great tank top though and I am excited for summer weather!
Like the band around waist- perfect for sports. A bit on long side, but overall true to size.
